text.autoconfig.cyti.title: Modifications of the Waste Containers
text.autoconfig.cyti.option.trashSetting: Empty bucket directly by right-clicking on the Fluid Trashcan.
When shift-clicking a bucket inside a Fluid Trashcan it immediately empties without changing slot.
The energy per tick input by items and cables, unless overruled by the source output.
The fluid per tick input by items and pipes, unless overruled by the source output.
